title: List of Spain international footballers
text:
This is a list of Spain international footballers – <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> players who have played for the <a href="Spain%20national%20football%20team">Spain national football team</a>. All players with 20 or more official <a href="cap%20%28football%29">cap</a>s are listed here.
This table is up to date, as of 14 October 2021.
